solution_line_template: Since wants needs an {desired_average} as an average and he takes {num_tests} tests, he must have {desired_average} * {num_tests} = <<{desired_average}*{num_tests}={total_points_needed}>>{total_points_needed} total points.
So for his fifth test he needs {total_points_needed} - {current_points} = <<{total_points_needed}-{current_points}={fifth_test_score_needed}>>{fifth_test_score_needed} points.
